original: Berg, Frans Gustaf, postmästare, Sävsjö, f. 30/10/87 i Karbenning, Väst-mani. 1., av Karl Gustaf B. o. Kristina Nord. G. 26 m. Margit Jonzon. Barn: Monica f. 30. — Reaiex. i Sthlm 17. Anst. v. postkont. i Grängesberg 11, v. Sthlm 5 15, e. postexp. i Sthlms distr. 19, i Södertälje 20, postexp. där s. å., i södra distr. 21, i Trelleb. 24, postassist. där 25, förste postassist. i Mariestad 39, postmäst. i Smedjebacken 44, i Sävsjö 46. GM.
translated: Berg, Frans Gustaf, postmaster, Sävsjö, b. 30/10/87 in Karbenning, Västmanland. Son of Karl Gustaf B. and Kristina Nord. Married Margit Jonzon in 1926. Children: Monica b. 1930. He worked at the post office in various positions, starting in Grängesberg in 1911, then in Stockholm from 1915 to 1920, followed by Södertälje where he worked as a post expeditor. He was then transferred to the southern district in 1921, Trelleborg in 1924, where he worked as a post assistant, and first post assistant in Mariestad in 1939. He became postmaster in Smedjebacken in 1944 and then in Sävsjö in 1946.
